programme.title: Land of the Bears
programme.desc: The filmmaker shines a light on the lives of five wild brown bears inhabiting the Kamchatka Peninsula, exploring their daily adventures and activities.

programme.title: The Rewrite
programme.desc: Keith Michaels, an Oscar-winning writer, teaches at the Binghamton University on the East Coast after losing his popularity in Hollywood and falls in love with Holly, a fellow teacher.

programme.title: And So It Goes
programme.desc: Oren is deliberately mean to the people around him. However, he is forced to change his attitude and take help from his neighbour Leah when he is asked to look after his nine-year-old granddaughter.

programme.title: Live - Mandira Bedi; The Love Laugh Live Show
programme.desc: The host invites prominent personalities and engages them in candid conversations about their personal and professional lives.

programme.title: Live - Mandira Bedi; The Love Laugh Live Show
programme.desc: The host invites prominent personalities and engages them in candid conversations about their personal and professional lives.

programme.title: Safe Haven
programme.desc: A mysterious young woman arrives in Southport, North Carolina, and falls in love with a widowed store owner. However, her dark past intrudes in her new life.

programme.title: StreetDance 2
programme.desc: After an embaressing defeat, a street dancer, Ash, assembles the best dancers from all across the world for another around against the Invincible crew.

programme.title: Penelope
programme.desc: A young girl hailing from an affluent family embarks on a quest for true love to dispel a curse that has pervaded her family.

programme.title: Fallen
programme.desc: Detective John Hobbes witnesses the execution of a demonic serial killer, Edgar Reese. However, questions arise when the murders start again, eerily matching the modus operandi of Reese.

programme.title: Ace Ventura: Pet Detective
programme.desc: Ace Ventura, a private detective, specialises in finding lost animals. One day, he is tasked with finding the missing mascot of an American football team.

programme.title: The Circus
programme.desc: The Tramp is hired by the proprietor of a circus after he stumbles into the middle of a performance and becomes the star attraction. He ends up falling in love with a horse rider.

programme.title: Life or Something Like It
programme.desc: A TV newswoman takes a look at her life after a psychic tells her that she has only days to live.

programme.title: Aloha
programme.desc: A celebrated military contractor reconnects with a long-lost love while falling for the air-force officer assigned to him.

programme.title: The Intern
programme.desc: Ben Whittaker, a 70-year-old widower, realises that he is not cut out for retirement. He then applies to become a senior intern for a sceptical boss at an online fashion site.

programme.title: 50 First Dates
programme.desc: Henry falls in love with Lucy, whose short-term memory loss makes her forget him every time she falls asleep. As a result, Henry decides to win her over every day after she wakes up.

programme.title: Big Mommas: Like Father, Like Son
programme.desc: After FBI agent Malcolm Turners stepson, Trent, witnesses a murder, the two are forced to go undercover. While Malcolm turns into Big Momma, Trent disguises himself as Charmaine.

programme.title: Love Is in the Air
programme.desc: Antonie and Julie, past lovers, coincidently find themselves seated next to each other on a flight. As conversation ensues, past memories are revived, as they strive to understand each other again.

programme.title: Land of the Bears
programme.desc: The filmmaker shines a light on the lives of five wild brown bears inhabiting the Kamchatka Peninsula, exploring their daily adventures and activities.

programme.title: Hollywood on Set
programme.desc: The key aspects of filmmaking are explored, with behind-the-scenes insights and intriguing interviews with prominent cast and crew members.

programme.title: DSC
programme.desc: Talented directors provide an entertaining insight into the most intriguing stories and anecdotes concerning some of their best works.

programme.title: Fly Me to the Moon
programme.desc: Isabelle plans to marry a stranger to break a family curse, which leads every first marriage to end in a divorce, in order to get married to her long-time boyfriend Pierre.

programme.title: St. Vincent
programme.desc: Maggie, a working single mother, allows Vincent, a hedonistic misanthrope, to babysit her 12-year-old son Oliver. Soon, a beautiful friendship develops between Vincent and Oliver.

programme.title: The Nut Job
programme.desc: An exiled squirrel plans to rob a nut store to provide food for his former colony. Unfortunately, the store is also a front for bank robbers.

programme.title: Alvin and the Chipmunks: Chipwrecked
programme.desc: While playing on a cruise ship, the chipmunks and the chipettes take their pranks too far and end up stranded on a tropical island, only to discover it is not as deserted as it seems.

programme.title: What Happens in Vegas
programme.desc: After a night of wild partying, two strangers awake and find they have married each other.

programme.title: The Gold Rush
programme.desc: During the Klondike Gold Rush, a lone prospector goes through a series of misfortunes, including a blizzard and starvation. However, he finds love even in the stormy Alaska.

programme.title: Legally Blonde 2: Red, White and Blonde
programme.desc: A recent Harvard Law graduate, Elle Woods campaigns for Bruisers Bill in Washington DC. She overcomes many obstacles to win her fight against animal testing.

programme.title: And So It Goes
programme.desc: Oren is deliberately mean to the people around him. However, he is forced to change his attitude and take help from his neighbour Leah when he is asked to look after his nine-year-old granddaughter.

programme.title: Sleepless in Seattle
programme.desc: Realising that Sam has still not come to terms with his wife Maggies death, his eight-year-old son Jonah forces him to call a national radio talk show, with the hopes of finding him a companion.

programme.title: Marmaduke
programme.desc: A family moves to a new neighbourhood with their adorable Great Dane, who is notorious for his inadvertent propensity to cause trouble.

programme.title: The Way, Way Back
programme.desc: Duncan, a shy teenager, visits a beach house owned by his mothers boyfriend. Annoyed with everyone, he wanders away to a local water park and meets Owen, who helps him open up to the world.

programme.title: Seizer
programme.desc: A contract killer and Seizer repossess vehicles from loan defaulters for a finance firm. However, their work takes a deadly turn when they cross paths with a vengeful gangster.

programme.title: Raj Vishnu
programme.desc: Rajini, the unemployed grandson of a wealthy man, tries to woo his childhood friend following the advice of an astrologer. However, his antics lead to hilarious situations.

programme.title: Bala
programme.desc: Bala, a young man, suffers from premature balding and struggles to measure up to social beauty standards. When his insecurity threatens his marriage, he seeks the help of a dark-complexioned lawyer.

programme.title: Garam Masala
programme.desc: A flirtatious photographer juggles three air hostesses behind his fiancees back. However, the facade unravels when his friend-turned-enemy starts snooping around.

programme.title: R... Rajkumar
programme.desc: Romeo, a ruffian, starts working for Shivraj, a drug lord, and they end up falling for the same girl, Chanda. Soon, a fight between the two ensues to win her over.

programme.title: Bhool Bhulaiyaa
programme.desc: Aditya Shrivastav, a psychologist, is called to investigate a palace haunted by a ghost. As he looks into the strange occurrences, he discovers the truth behind them.

programme.title: Dream Girl 2
programme.desc: To marry his love, Karam, a middle-class boy, disguises himself as Pooja and becomes a dancer at a bar to earn money quickly. However, his cross-dressing soon lands him a complicated mess.

programme.title: Bholaa Shankar
programme.desc: A cab driver in Calcutta struggles to rebuild his life with his sister while confronting a haunting past. Subsequently, he fights to protect his future and family from the citys gritty underworld.

programme.title: Vivegam
programme.desc: Ajay Kumar, a former counter-terrorism agent, is called for a special mission. However, he is betrayed by his friends and is accused of extremely treasonous acts.

programme.title: Double Barrel
programme.desc: Pancho and Vinci struggle to make money to buy precious stones from a don. When they attempt to make a crucial deal, complications arise and a large-scale gang war erupts.

programme.title: Exodus: Gods and Kings
programme.desc: Moses, an Egyptian royal member, defies Ramses, the Pharaoh, after learning his Israeli heritage. However, things become complicated when he decides to free 400,000 Israelis from slavery and plagues.

programme.title: The Chronicles of Narnia: The Voyage of the Dawn Treader
programme.desc: Siblings Edmund and Lucy return to the fantasy realm of Narnia with their cousin, Eustace. Soon, the trio embarks on a voyage across the seas with an old friend to rescue seven lords.

programme.title: Thor
programme.desc: Stripped of his powers, Thor must prove his worthiness to reclaim his hammer and stop his brother Loki from taking the throne of Asgard with the help of scientist Jane Foster.

programme.title: Journey to the West: Conquering the Demons
programme.desc: Tang Sanzang, a Buddhist, decides to free a fishing village of demons it is plagued by. He teams up with Miss Duan, a demon hunter, and begins to fall in love with her.

programme.title: Hotel Transylvania 3: Summer Vacation
programme.desc: On a luxury monster cruise ship, Dracula meets Ericka, the captain of the ship, and falls for her. However, he is unaware that she is part of the Van Helsing family, who want to destroy all monsters.

programme.title: Avengers: Endgame
programme.desc: Thanos, an intergalactic warlord, erases half of all life in the universe. As a result, the Avengers must reunite to reverse his actions only to find out that he destroyed the Infinity Stones.

programme.title: Bad Boys II
programme.desc: Mike and Marcus, the Miami Police Department detectives, investigate the flow of drugs into Miami. Their search leads them to a dangerous drug lord who is planning to control the citys drug trade.

programme.title: Sword Master
programme.desc: A master swordsman is haunted by his greatest skill and simply wishes to live in peace. However, a rival who aims to take his place at all costs forces him to wield his weapon once again.

programme.title: Godzilla x Kong: The New Empire
programme.desc: Godzilla and Kong, two titans from the ancient world, join forces to face a colossal threat emerging from deep within the earths core.

programme.title: Alien vs. Predator
programme.desc: The archaeology team from Weyland Industries finds itself trapped between two alien species.

programme.title: Star Wars : Aakhri Yodha
programme.desc: A young woman seeks to learn the ways of the Jedi under a powerful master, in order to reinvigorate a powerful war against a military movement.

programme.title: Operation Red Sea
programme.desc: A Chinese special forces unit must rescue their fellow citizens in the country of Yewaire on the Arabian Peninsula amidst violent coup and threats from a terrorist group.

programme.title: Super Typhoon
programme.desc: A wrathful goddess unleashes a cataclysmic typhoon upon the world as punishment for humanitys transgressions. Panic ensues as people are forced to confront monstrous creatures amid the chaos.

programme.title: The Kings Man
programme.desc: One man must race against time to stop historys worst tyrants and criminal masterminds from wiping out millions of people.

programme.title: The Mermaid ()
programme.desc: Shan, a beautiful mermaid, is sent on a mission to kill Liu Xuan, a business tycoon. However, complications arise when they develop feelings for each other.

programme.title: Aladdin
programme.desc: Aladdin, a lovable street urchin, teams up with a powerful, wisecracking genie to save the kingdom of Agrabah, and its beautiful princess Jasmine from the evil grand vizier Jafar.

programme.title: Avatar: The Way of Water
programme.desc: Sixteen years after defeating the RDA, Jake lives with his family on Pandora as the chief of the Omatikaya clan. But, when an old enemy resurfaces, they have to take refuge with the Metkayina clan.

programme.title: Spider-Man: Far From Home
programme.desc: Peter Parker, the beloved superhero Spider-Man, faces four destructive elemental monsters while on holiday in Europe. Soon, he receives help from Mysterio, a fellow hero with mysterious origins.

programme.title: Titanic
programme.desc: Poor artist Jack and rich debutante Rose fall in love with each other while aboard the unsinkable Titanic. However, the trip takes a turn for the worse when the ship hits an iceberg.
